Reviews.Title: Good but Expensive
Reviews.Author: pking
Reviews.Content: A little expensive. maybe I should have shopped around. Highly visible, good design. Remember there are only 4 in the package

Reviews.Title: security stickers
Reviews.Author: David Pippen
Reviews.Content: The stickers are easy to read and adhere very tightly to glass.  In my view, they are just the right size to attract those entering the premises.  I have not had them installed long enough to evaluate fading due to sunlight.  Be aware that they must be attached to the insight surface of a transparent window.  Be sure and carefully align before attaching to the surface.  Once stuck, they are really stuck!!!!

Reviews.Title: Love these
Reviews.Author: Jonathon
Reviews.Content: Very happy with these. Like other reviews have said they are small but VERY noticeable. Who would want a giant one on their window? My only regret is not buying 2 packs.I believe these are great deterrents to burglaries when you can not afford a security system. You don't have to have Fort Knox, you just have to look less inviting than your neighbor :)

Reviews.Title: A good deterrent.
Reviews.Author: DoomsDayJ
Reviews.Content: These are a great addition to a real security system (If it did not come with stickers) or even if you don't have one at all. Good value for the price. These are inside the window stickers FYI I did't realize that til they came. Still no biggy-- they work the same.

Reviews.Title: Good little stickers
Reviews.Author: Paul Lahr "tony"
Reviews.Content: I've had them up on my window for about 3 days now and so far so good. Just sucks you can't stick them to a door without double sided tape.

Reviews.Title: I feel more secure with the stickers
Reviews.Author: Lisa Swan
Reviews.Content: My car was recently stolen and I got it back and now I have the Warning stickers on my car windows and my son's car windows and I think it will discourage thieves.

Reviews.Title: Love the stickers
Reviews.Author: Longfellow
Reviews.Content: These stickers work great.  I've put these on all our doors and one window.  They are very visable, stick well on glass, and should get the attention of any would be thief.  Cheap protection, and with our video cameras, thiefs will think twice.

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Lyssy89
Reviews.Content: They are just what you expect, arrived on time in good condition. Put them on my old car and am crossing my fingers.

Reviews.Title: Alarm Sticker
Reviews.Author: Ronald F. Curlewis
Reviews.Content: Would have liked the stickers to have been just a little larger otherwise a good companion for the Doberman Security Ultra Slim Window Alert's.

Reviews.Title: Security Stickers
Reviews.Author: Glow
Reviews.Content: These work great on our seasonal rentals and I would buy again.  Last year I bought some and they are still good, haven't faded at all.  I bought some for one of my elderly year round renters and they feel more secure with them.  I also got the yard stake for the front.

Reviews.Title: Fake out The Intruder
Reviews.Author: Mr. Joel L. Sys "Tamango_racine"
Reviews.Content: A good buy for those who do not want to invest in a home/business security system. They get the point. The stickers last longer than most being offered.

Reviews.Title: Get better fingernails!
Reviews.Author: Harleyschoolboy
Reviews.Content: If you want to stick these to a window, you will need good fingernails.I could not seperate sticker from backing. But the GE 45115 wireless alarms I ordered with them worked very well.

Reviews.Title: Looks good, holds up to direct sunlight well.
Reviews.Author: D. Drummond
Reviews.Content: I waited to review this to see how they would hold up in direct sunlight. Many security stickers often fade right way. I'm pleased to say a year later, they still look as good as day one, so I'll be ordering some more soon for the other windows in the house.

Reviews.Title: WARNING SECURITY STICKERS
Reviews.Author: TAYLOE7
Reviews.Content: PERFECT SECURITY WARNING STICKERS WITH UV FADE PROTECTION ON THE OUTSIDE AND FOR THE FRONT AND BACK OF YOUR HOME. REALLY IN THE WINDOWS OR WHEREVER YOU CHOOSE TO PLACE THEM.

Reviews.Title: Nice Decals.
Reviews.Author: JimXeod
Reviews.Content: Great Decals. In my case it is backed by a real alarm, but might work as a deterrent stand alone.

Reviews.Title: Great Security
Reviews.Author: Grammy of 4
Reviews.Content: These stickers are the perfect size for our windows and doors.  We mounted them near the handle of the glass paned doors and I am sure everyone can clearly see we do have an alarm system and to stay away!!!

Reviews.Title: Great for DIY Security Systems
Reviews.Author: S. Eckelberry
Reviews.Content: I purchased these stickers alongside a Fortress security system, and I’m very satisfied. The stickers apply to the inside of the window, and are clearly visible at a good distance outside. I strongly recommend these for anyone looking to make it clear that an alarm system is installed. I would like these stickers to imply that the alarm system is networked. “24/7 MONITORING” might be something to add.

Reviews.Title: Overpriced sticker
Reviews.Author: Raja Mitri
Reviews.Content: Not worth the money. The extra one they give you is worthless and not usable.They should sell a dozen for the price to make it worth the money.

Reviews.Title: Doesn't fade
Reviews.Author: LordMaul
Reviews.Content: The best thing is it doens't fade.  I have purchased the GE window alarm cling, they don't even last one year.  They fade to the point you can't even read the writing (thus what is the point).I has some of these left over and placed them in my car.  My work does not have covered parking.  Sitting out in the sun all day and the stickers looked brand new after over a year.They stick wonderfully, yet come off clean when you are done.

Reviews.Title: No fade and still sticking
Reviews.Author: G. Lowe
Reviews.Content: Applied to some doors 3 months ago and no fade and still sticking.  I applied an exterior one i got for free at the same time.  In two weeks that one was faded and peeling.  No one has broken in but can't say these are the reason.

Reviews.Title: Cheaper than a security system!
Reviews.Author: marcia, tomball, tx.
Reviews.Content: Bought these for an elderly relative who lives by herself to stick in her windows.  Cheaper than a security system for her and who's to know there really isn't one activated!  Came quickly and she is pleased with the suggestion.  Peace of mind for all concerned!

Reviews.Title: Worth their weight in gold.  Get them.
Reviews.Author: Bellevue Native
Reviews.Content: I saw a few bad review about these stickers but mine look really nice and stuck on the inside glass facing out very well.  They are the perfect size.  No to big and not to small. Text is displayed well.  Large enough to catch the eye of a criminal but not so larges to harm the looks of your car.Testimonial:I had a similar sticker on an old Jeep that I drove to a high school basketball game.  When I left the game to go home, a dozen cars were broken into all around and next to my Jeep but mine was untouched.  Glass from another cars window was laying under my Jeep.  If you have an auto security system, it's better to display the fact via a window sticker than let someone break a window to find out the hard way.

Reviews.Title: look good
Reviews.Author: daryl moses
Reviews.Content: these look good and should make someone trying to break in think twice. I put them in conspicuous places doors, windows, etc.

Reviews.Title: They are tiny
Reviews.Author: Kevin
Reviews.Content: I didn't realize how small they were.  I should have looked more and definitely would buy different ones next time

Reviews.Title: Great little sticker
Reviews.Author: E. Jones
Reviews.Content: I've been using these in my home office windows and they have held up great.  I think the style is a nice balance between tasteful design and grabbing a potential burglar’s attention.

Reviews.Title: A Must Have For Bad Guys
Reviews.Author: PrettyPicky
Reviews.Content: I bought these for myself and for my parents which are 87 along with a alarm yard sign and a fake security camera which are on my reviews.Bad guys do not like alarm stickers !!!

Reviews.Title: Does its job
Reviews.Author: BWG
Reviews.Content: It was easy to apply.  It is very noticeable.  We will see whether or not it fades over time since one of the windows faces direct sunlight.

Reviews.Title: Easy to use
Reviews.Author: JT
Reviews.Content: good quality makes a good impression when stuck on a window, keeps the amateurs away and that is good Love em

Reviews.Title: Looks good enough....
Reviews.Author: Saavy Shopper
Reviews.Content: Haven't had them on the house yet to see how they will deter would be theives..but, look good enough  I guess anything is better than nothing

Reviews.Title: defender 4 pack stickers.
Reviews.Author: combat yid
Reviews.Content: have them on doors in fla, both face the hot sun, over one year, has not faded, can be applied inside or outside of the windows. i have them applied to the inside of the window. attention getting colors black and yellow.

Reviews.Title: Big stickers
Reviews.Author: Laura "Buyer"
Reviews.Content: Definitely will be noticed. I would prefer smaller size so I am not using them.  If you want it noticed from far away use these

Reviews.Title: Tiny Stickers
Reviews.Author: Matt
Reviews.Content: If whoever wants to break in has a microscope to read these it may keep them from breaking in but it may be difficult for them. I should have read the spec before buying but I thought they would be better. I have some other ones that came with my security system so I can put these on some windows in some other areas of the house.

Reviews.Title: Good Sticker
Reviews.Author: A. Piasecki
Reviews.Content: Haven't had a break-in yet, but i haven't had one without it either. I'm sure it might give a thief a second thought, and that might be enough in some cases.

Reviews.Title: Authoritative but not Versatile
Reviews.Author: Donald Gillman
Reviews.Content: Great, bossy-looking little stickers, but they only have glue on one side, so you need to stick them to glass or put your own glue on the back. My neighbors straighten up their ties when passing my house since I've put these up!

Reviews.Title: Look good
Reviews.Author: Rod
Reviews.Content: They look like a realistic warning sticker and stick on the inside of the door or window.Hopefully they will do the job.

Reviews.Title: Very Professional
Reviews.Author: Dennis Johnson "Shopper"
Reviews.Content: They look like something a professional security company would install on your home. They're bright and submit a powerful warning to any would be intruder.I think thieves would rather break into a house that didn't warn them they were being video recorded.They're very easy to apply. And very visible. Everything you'd want in this type of warning.

Reviews.Title: GREAT
Reviews.Author: CFS-BOOKS
Reviews.Content: WOULD RECOMMED THIS TO ANYONE AS A DETERENT TO HELP PROTECT YOUR CAR FROM ANY POTENTIAL THIEFS. A++ NICE PRICE TOO

Reviews.Title: Cool labels - No issues so far
Reviews.Author: Canadian Gypsy
Reviews.Content: Well, read the posting for these labels & some folks had this weird fading issue, granted I've only had one exposed to the sun in a window - no noticeable fade that I can tell & it's Texas sun - you'd think that if anything was going to fade - it's being exposed to sun here in Texas were not only can it get stupid hot - but the run's rays def get ya every time. Thus - I'd have to say - so far so good with this product.

Reviews.Title: Fooled 'em!
Reviews.Author: Sabrina G. Hindman
Reviews.Content: I had a security alarm salesman to come to my door a couple of weeks ago...I showed him the sticker, he looked at it...and thought I had an alarm system!  lol!!  Then he left!

Reviews.Title: Easy On, Easy Off
Reviews.Author: FloridaDave
Reviews.Content: These stickers go on easily and look professional.  The colors catch people's eye, and the stickers don't peel up in the heat and fall off.

Reviews.Title: good for people to see
Reviews.Author: dj mark
Reviews.Content: good for people to see,these stickers show real good threw the windows at your home,you dont want people to break in your house,you want to deter them from breaking into your house,if they see these stickers,they just might think twice about breaking into your house.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: Ronwald
Reviews.Content: Awesome for newbie thieves who easily gets rattled upon seeing a warning sign but i doubt when it comes to the experts.

Reviews.Title: does the job
Reviews.Author: Ehran
Reviews.Content: simple stickers, look like genuine stickers from a security company, sticked them on visible entry points at home and from the outside really looks like the real thing !

Reviews.Title: They need to work on the UV part
Reviews.Author: Asiago
Reviews.Content: They've been up for about less than a month they're starting to fade already. Other than that they do what they're intended to do.

Reviews.Title: The work as intended.
Reviews.Author: Maynez
Reviews.Content: There is nothing especial on these warning stickers. They are exactly as they look in the picture. I wish they were a little bigger.

Reviews.Title: Feel secure and sleep peacefully.
Reviews.Author: Shopalcholic
Reviews.Content: Since I purchased these on Amazon and put it on my windows and doors and now every night I feel secure and sleep peacefully.

Reviews.Title: Don't waste your money
Reviews.Author: xloria
Reviews.Content: I never even put these up. They don't look real and I don't think that they would deter anyone. Don't buy

Reviews.Title: Its ok
Reviews.Author: Don
Reviews.Content: Its better than nothing but does not look like a  real security system notice label .  I am still looking

Reviews.Title: they stick
Reviews.Author: mari0810
Reviews.Content: i needed sticker for my fake security camera and they look believable to hide my bluff with the cameras. with a good price

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: NetByte "NetByte"
Reviews.Content: Yes, I would recommend this item. It arrived as advertised, on time, safely packaged, and I had no issues at all.I would def do business with this company again.Excellent product !! -Jim  :-)

Reviews.Title: Perfect for my needs
Reviews.Author: Jaci Carroll
Reviews.Content: I needed something for my RV. Easy to apply. Looks very real. will give me some peace of mind especially when I need to leave the RV for shopping.

Reviews.Title: serves the purpose
Reviews.Author: Brad
Reviews.Content: These stickers do just what you want them to do. Have to wait to see how UV rays affect them, but properly placed they should last a few years at least.

Reviews.Title: security signs
Reviews.Author: d517
Reviews.Content: Love these small signs to go in windows or door side lights.  They are self sticking and UV protected so they wont fade from the sun.  I like them and have added them to my front door and back windows.

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: Nancy
Reviews.Content: Great, so far have not had any break-ins and people think is the real thing. I love this little stickers.

Reviews.Title: looks good
Reviews.Author: Kemosabe "Tom"
Reviews.Content: Looks good.  Liked the UV Fade resistance feature, since the sun will be hitting it.  Only time will tell how well they hold up.Am happy with the product, and would recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Defender Security Stickers
Reviews.Author: Chavi Vadoma
Reviews.Content: Stickers look bold and professional.  But be careful--positioning on curved glass, like inside a car window, takes a little skill.  Pre-position the stickers before exposing the sticky side.  I ruined the first 2 stickers trying to adjust their position on the glass--my fault.  Product itself is very good.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Dwnundrguy
Reviews.Content: Just as it looks - worked well for my cabin as my security system came without stickers and I didnt want anyone trying to break in.Sticky enough to stay on in cold and wet outdoor conditions while still removable if you change your mind and want to remove it.

Reviews.Title: For windows.
Reviews.Author: Randy D.
Reviews.Content: Stickers work great. Easy to apply. Stay on well. For windows only, though. Cannot use on doors and such. They seem to have the correct type of wording I needed to alert potential criminals. Hard to find cheap stickers with quality graphics and wording. (There are several cheesy onces out there to avoid.)

Reviews.Title: mine was opened??
Reviews.Author: Barrett
Reviews.Content: Product arrived on time and in great shape, only problem I had was that mine was already opened and there was a piece of clear tape holding the plastic on the cardboard backing?? opened it up and there was four unused ones in there so i guess i dont mind.  pictures represent product to a T.

Reviews.Title: Good Stickers poor business practice
Reviews.Author: George Blake
Reviews.Content: The stickers work like stickers are supposed to: They stick. Not only are they a deterrent but they also are a visual indicator that the glass door is closed. I have no problems with the stickers. I would give them 5 stars, BUT, the current business practice of not allowing anyone to buy these stickers unless you buy $25 of other items is annoying. I would not mind paying shipping if I ordered them by themselves but I was forced to find other things to buy in order to buy these stickers. That practice gets 1 star. So I averaged the stars to 3.

Reviews.Title: Does The Job!
Reviews.Author: OnceUponATime
Reviews.Content: The security warning labels were just what they said they were.  They were easy to apply, easy to see and hopefully will warn all would-be burglars.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Emory G. Fristoe
Reviews.Content: These stickers are very much professionally done.  They are clear concise and really stand out and make a statement.  How can you go wrong with a price like this as well.  Thanks for the great product.

Reviews.Title: Security Decals
Reviews.Author: bluboy619
Reviews.Content: Product is very visible and hopefully it last a while...  I recommend this item to everyone who wants to let everyone know that there house is protected...

Reviews.Title: Small but good enough for me
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: These stickers are bright and clearly printed. They are small but that's good enough for my window, which isn't big anyway.

Reviews.Title: GREAT
Reviews.Author: Terry
Reviews.Content: I like these Security Stickers , just right size , also they are placed on inside winow or door , wee bit larger than a Credit card . i hope the UV fadingworks like Adv. says .

Reviews.Title: Great  Addition to your Home Security
Reviews.Author: Evalistic
Reviews.Content: This is a very good product - Looks professional and is a better quality then the ones I replaced. Makes a great combo with the door alarms I purcahsed at the same time.Defender SP100-ST 4 Pack of Window Warning Stickers with UV Fade Protection (Black)GE 45117 Deluxe Wireless Door Alarm

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: Linda R "Linda"
Reviews.Content: Orders these stickers before I had a security system installed.  They still look good even those that are in direct sun light.

Reviews.Title: Defender Stickers
Reviews.Author: Dr. No
Reviews.Content: Howdie, These little stickers are professional looking. I stuck them up at all my entry ways. The do catch your eye right. Highly recommeded.

Reviews.Title: It works!
Reviews.Author: Lovethemovies
Reviews.Content: It does the job it was intended to do.  No one asks quetions about it being real.  Thank you so much.

Reviews.Title: Inexpensive alternative
Reviews.Author: B Safe "dugerman85"
Reviews.Content: WE have had quite a few burglaries in our neighborhood, including one to the house next door to us. We are not away for long periods of time or very often, but the burglars seem to know when people are not home. I bought these as a deterent. So far we haven't been hit. Whether it is the signs or not is anyone's guess, but for the price its worth trying.

Reviews.Title: Security System Warning Stickers
Reviews.Author: K. Moore
Reviews.Content: After reading an article on posting security stickers on your doors and windows as a theft deterrent, I ordered these Security Stickers and installed them. The arrived quickly.

Reviews.Title: wrong size
Reviews.Author: Charles
Reviews.Content: I brought this security sticker and it said it was 5in x 5 in but when I measured it and it is 3 in by 3in guess the China people cant measure, I am sending back, that's what happens when you buy from China

Reviews.Title: As expected, and on time..
Reviews.Author: bizgoody1
Reviews.Content: I purchased these stickers as more of a deterrent than anything, and I have combined them with a non-connected DIY security system in my home that I purchased about 6 months ago... I live in a nice historical neighborhood that I like to joke with my friends and say is "ghetto-adjacent", as the neighborhood is nice, but it can get a little rough a few blocks out..  These stickers, in my opinion, look convincing enough to make someone move along to their next target if they were thinking of breaking in, they stick well, and seem to be holding up well to moisture/condensation (We've had a ton of rain)  All in all, I'd say it's the worth-the-money purchase, great price, and as described..

Reviews.Title: For the price - it's a good buy
Reviews.Author: SHARATHKUMAR RAGHAVANNAIR "Sharath"
Reviews.Content: For the price - it's a good buyFor the price - it's a good buyFor the price - it's a good buy

Reviews.Title: Ehhh...
Reviews.Author: Lauro Mejia
Reviews.Content: I bought this to go with my PlasmaGlow 10462 Green Predator LED Scanner. I live in a bad neighborhood and I thought these would scare the ignorant robber. They are about credit card size but to be honest they look fake. I didn't like them. It's great if you have an alarm system but I don't. I would recommend to buy if you have an alarm system not to make people think twice like I am.

Reviews.Title: LARRY
Reviews.Author: Larry
Reviews.Content: THE DEFENDER SP100-ST 4 PACK OF WINDOW WARNING WARNING STICKERS WITH UV FADE PROTECTION (BLACK)CAME ON TIME A FRIEND WAS VISITING ME AND SAID USE HAVE VIDEO CAMERA I SAID YES. Defender SP100-ST 4 Pack of Window Warning Stickers with UV Fade Protection (Black)

Reviews.Title: I'm Sure Burglars Use Google Too
Reviews.Author: R. Lefever
Reviews.Content: People, if a savvy burglar cases your joint and sees any stickers like these, all they have to do is Google your window sticker and the results will lead them right back to these fake stickers.  Try Googling it yourself.  Sure, these stickers may be better than nothing, but I can't see paying all that money for stickers that should be selling for 30 cents including shipping.

Reviews.Title: Worst product ever! Do not purchase.
Reviews.Author: Linda
Reviews.Content: I would rate this a Zero. Product worked for 2 door openings, then just quit. We never had a chance to "try it out" as product never made past the initial install. It should be taken off the market. The window alarms Do Not work either. Don' t waste your money or time. The whole purpose for the alarm is safety. It failed!

ProductInfo.Features:
Defend your property against theft and damage with these simple deterrents
The stickers can be posted and removed easily, and the adhesive will not leave a messy residue
Combat fading with UV protected material
ProductInfo.Name: Defender SP100-ST 4 Pack of Window Warning Stickers with UV Fade Protection (Black)
